description.en:
1-2: Ren'ai Han'i 1%
Kagami and Fukamachi are two friends who both secretly love each other. One day, Kagami tells Fukamachi that he's interested in his sister Lisa, upon which Fukamachi reluctantly decides to take Kagami home to see Lisa. Now Kagami is faced with showing Fukamachi how he feels before he's forced to go out with a girl he doesn't love...

3: Urahara na Koi
Kyouya, a socially awkward college student, has trouble smiling and gets bullied at school. What happens when he stumbles into high school student Akira when he's out drinking?

4: S ni Ochita Seinen
Kyouya is in love with Shirou, his business partner, but Shirou already has a lover?!

5: Don't Worry About It!
Ryuusei has long been in love with the carefree and friendly Nagisa, who on the other hand is oblivious of Ryuusei's feelings for him. The day comes when Ryuusei has had enough and he confesses to Nagisa by issuing an ultimatum: to become his lover or to stop all contact with him. Now, what will Nagisa do?

6: Amai Koto Shitai
Although Otonashi's first impression of Tonozaki-senpai was "horrible" when they first met as members of the students' council, their relationship soon alters through time after their involvement with each other.
description.pl: Zbiór kilku historii. Główna opowiada o dwóch sekretnie zakochanych w sobie przyjaciołach, ale żaden z nich nie wie o uczuciu drugiego, w dodatku Kagami oznajmił Fukamachi, że sympatyzuje z jego siostrą. Gdy Fukamachi postanawia zaaranżować ich spotkanie, Kagami musi stawić czoła swoim uczuciom do przyjaciela, zanim zacznie umawiać się z dziewczyną, której nie kocha.
